jumbotron.heading: An online donation platform
jumbotron.maximum-transparency: with a maximum degree of transparency
jumbotron.eliminate-misuse: aimed at eliminating misuses of donation campaigns
jumbotron.improve-donation-culture: aimed at improving the donation culture in Bulgaria

activity-section.heading: What do we do?
activity-section.content: Podkrepi.bg is an association of professionals united by the idea of creating a free and completely transparent online donation platform, which can be used freely by citizens and organizations.

team-section.heading: Who are we?
team-section.content: We are a group of volunteers united by the idea of improveing charity in Bulgaria and supporting good causes and the fight for a better life.

team-chart-section.heading: How it all started?
team-chart-section.content: 736 volunteers from the IT community, lawyers, accountants, marketers, medics, NGO representatives, united by the idea of improving donation platforms in Bulgaria.

mission-vision-goals-section.mission-text: To create a completely transparent online donation platform, supported by donations and membership fees to our association, and not % commission from the companies.
mission-vision-goals-section.vision-text: To improve drastically the donation culture in Bulgaria by increasing the level of transparency and trust in donation campaigns and platforms.
mission-vision-goals-section.goals-text-open-source: - To create an open-source platform which reduces the chances of misuse.
